pageTitle: SusDoX Support - Explanations and access to support for the SusDoX system
pageDescription: Problems or uncertainties with the SusDoX system? Find details and access to support here.

sharedContent.contentSloganText: With SusDoX WebView, you can securely view your images and reports online at any time.
sharedContent.doctorSloganText: With SusDoX WebView, you can securely view images and reports online at any time.

content.doctorregistrationButtonText: Help & Support for Doctors, Clinics, etc.
content.doctorSupportSubText:
You can reach us by phone at 0660 8851001 or 0660 8851000
Contact times: Mon-Fri: 08:00 to 12:00 | Mon-Thu: 13:00 to 16:00
content.doctorSupportFormHeadingText: Inquiries, forgotten login details, or first-time registration:
content.svnLoginNoPinTitleButtonText:
I don't have the SusDoX Code?
-> Request here
content.svnLogin404ErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.svnLogin401ErrorText:
Login with the provided data is not possible!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.pinRenewErrorText:
Sending a text message is not possible with the provided data!
Please check your inputs or try again later!
content.requestCodeSuccessText: A text message with the Code has just been sent to the entered number.
content.patientSupportSubText:
We strive to provide the best possible service.
Please describe your concern as precisely as possible.
Contact times: Mon-Fri: 08:00 to 12:00 | Mon-Thu: 13:00 to 16:00
content.registrationContactFaxLabelText: Please send my login details via SMS!
content.patientsupportSuccessMessage:
Thank you for your message.
We will process it as quickly as possible and get back to you!

Thank you for your message.
